page.title: 11COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: {TRANSPORT:}Most own at least one motor car. Some of the teenagers have a motor-bike or moped. There is a fairly frequent bus service to Jedburgh,Hawick and Kelso. The Post Office also runs a Post Busservice. Taxis can be hired from neighbouring towns of Kelso and Jedburgh. {Post:}There is a once a day delivery to all households and a twice a day collection from post boxes in the area.Mon/Fri.,and one collection on a Saturday. {Telephone:}Most households have a private telephone. There are also public telephone kiosks in the villages of Crailing and Eckford.
